fieldUpdates.description: Update Cc Additional People to true
fieldUpdates.name: Cc Additional People =true

fieldUpdates.description: Update Send Email to Additional People in CC with the concatenation of Cc Email Additional People and CC Email
fieldUpdates.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Send_Email_to_Additional_People_in_CC__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(CC_Email__c)) ), CC_Email__c+';'+Send_Email_to_Additional_People_in_CC__c, IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Send_Email_to_Additional_People_in_CC__c)), Send_Email_to_Additional_People_in_CC__c, IF( NOT(ISBLANK(CC_Email__c)), CC_Email__c, '' ) ) )
fieldUpdates.name: Send Email to Additional People in CC

fieldUpdates.name: Send Service Report To Contact=true

fieldUpdates.name: Update First Time Fix Count

rules.description: To notify technician of a work order assignment.
rules.formula: AND( OR( AND(NOT(Partner_Installation_WO__c),TEXT(SVMXC__Order_Status__c) ='Assigned'), AND(Partner_Installation_WO__c, TEXT(SVMXC__Order_Status__c) ='Assignment Accepted') ), SVMXC__Dispatch_Status__c='Assigned', OR( ISNEW(),ISCHANGED(SVMXC__Group_Member__c)), TEXT(SVMXC__Order_Type__c) = 'Preventative Maintenance', NOT($Setup.PM_WorkOrder_Assignment__c.Block_Email__c) )

rules.description: This workflow is used to send information captured on the "Note to Technician" text field to assigned technicians on a Work Order using the "Notify Assigned Technicians" email template.

rules.fullName: SVMX_PS - Notify Preferred Tech of Customer Down
rules.description: This workflow is used to send an email to the Preferred Technician identified on the Work Order of a new WO created with the Customer Down field set to true
This Workflow is used to sent the assigned technician an email notification.

criteriaItems.value: Closed,Canceled,Technician Enroute,Technician Onsite,Ready to Invoice,Work Complete

rules.description: Used to set the Work Order Status to Assigned after the Dispatch Console is used to dispatch the Technician.

rules.fullName: WO%3A Qualtrics Survey%3A Send Installation Survey
rules.description: Qualtrics Survey: Send survey to the work order contact for installations
Work Order: Qualtrics Surveys: Send iSeq installs converted to remote support to qualtrics for self installation survey
To check if Completed When Created Checkbox is true.

rules.fullName: Work Order %3A Notify Owner for Cycle Count
rules.description: To notify owner when cycle count work order is created or owner is changed.

rules.fullName: Work Order %3A Set to Assigned From Dispatch Console
rules.description: Used to set the Work Order Status to Assigned after the Dispatch Console is used to dispatch the Technician. Dummy commit
rules.formula: AND( NOT(AND( ISCHANGED(SVMXC__Order_Status__c), TEXT(SVMXC__Order_Status__c) = $Label.WorkOrderStatusTechnicianOnsite )), NOT(Record_Type__c = $Label.WorkOrderRecordTypeFieldStockMgmt), NOT($Setup.Channel_Partner_Profile_Settings__c.Is_Channel_Partner__c), SVMXC__Dispatch_Status__c = $Label.DispatchStatusEqualsAssigned, ISCHANGED(SVMXC__Group_Member__c), NOT(AND( TEXT(SVMXC__Order_Status__c) = $Label.WorkOrderStatusAssignmentAccepted, ISCHANGED(SVMXC__Order_Status__c) )), NOT(AND( TEXT(SVMXC__Order_Status__c) = $Label.WorkOrderStatusAssigned, ISCHANGED(SVMXC__Order_Status__c) )), NOT(Is_Reopen_Approved__c) )

rules.fullName: Work Order %3A Uncheck Send To ERP
Work Order %3A Update First Time Fix Count
rules.description: To update the first time fix count

rules.fullName: Work Order %3A Update Product Group for ICE
rules.description: Update product group on ICE_WO_Products__c. This field is used in ICE integration.

rules.fullName: Work Order %3A Update on Activity Closure
rules.description: Update status of Work Order to Closed, when the Activities are closed.

rules.fullName: Work Order %3A Update on Delivered Parts Order
rules.description: Update status of Work Order to Closed, when all the parts order are delivered

rules.fullName: Work Order %3A Update on Field Compliance Review Activity
rules.description: Update status of Work Order to Closed, when the Field Compliance Review Activity is closed.

rules.fullName: Work Order %3APopulate Annual PM WO Data
rules.description: Work Order : Populate PM WO Schedule date and Onsite response due date
To capture the date/time closed field when work order is closed

rules.fullName: Work Order%3A Set status to Assignment Accepted
rules.description: When a Channel Partner creates a record then set the work order status to Assignment Accepted.

rules.fullName: Work Order%3A Work Order Initiated Or Assigned
rules.description: DCP-1115: This workflow reminds the work order owners of the inactive work order

rules.formula: AND( Is_Auto_Dispatch__c, ISPICKVAL(SVMXC__Order_Status__c , 'Assigned'), SVMXC__SLA_Terms__r.Least_SLA__c = 1440, Integration_Status__c != 'Fail', AND( Order_Previous_Status__c != $Label.WorkOrderStatusClosed, Order_Previous_Status__c != $Label.WorkOrderStatusCompleted, Order_Previous_Status__c != $Label.WorkOrderStatusReopenRequested ) )

AND( Is_Auto_Dispatch__c,ISPICKVAL(SVMXC__Order_Status__c , 'Assigned'), OR( SVMXC__SLA_Terms__r.Least_SLA__c > 1440 , ISNULL(Onsite_Response_Due_Date__c) ), Integration_Status__c != 'Fail', AND( Order_Previous_Status__c != $Label.WorkOrderStatusClosed, Order_Previous_Status__c != $Label.WorkOrderStatusCompleted, Order_Previous_Status__c != $Label.WorkOrderStatusReopenRequested ) )

rules.description: work flow triggers when there is change in cc email or send email to additional people in cc.
Mark Is Customer Sign Mandatory on work order as true if WO is Billable or Order Type Equals Installation.
To notify technician of a work order assignment.
rules.formula: OR (AND( OR( AND(NOT(Partner_Installation_WO__c),TEXT(SVMXC__Order_Status__c) ='Assigned'), AND(Partner_Work_Order__c, TEXT(SVMXC__Order_Status__c) ='Assignment Accepted') ), SVMXC__Dispatch_Status__c='Assigned', OR( ISNEW(),ISCHANGED(SVMXC__Group_Member__c)), NOT(TEXT(SVMXC__Order_Type__c) = 'Preventative Maintenance') ),AND(ISCHANGED( OwnerId ),NOT(ISCHANGED(SVMXC__Group_Member__c)),ISCHANGED( PO_Number__c )))

rules.description: To update contact phone and contact email on work order based on associated contact

To update Onsite Response Due Date to attend Work Order based on the SLA Terms
